oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sunday Down South - 1954-07-25 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program Sunday Down South, sponsored by Lion Oil. Originally broadcast 1954-07-25 at 5:00 pm, part 1. Personnel include Buddy Hall (host, performer), David Cobb (announcer), Owen Bradley (conductor) and the Lion Orchestra (performer), the Anita Kerr Singers (performers), and Dolores Watson (performer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Buddy Hall; Owen Bradley; Lion Orchestra; Anita Kerr Singers; Dolores Watson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Got The South In My Soul) (Buddy Hall) -- Opening statement (David Cobb) -- Opening statement (Buddy Hall) -- In A Shanty In Old Shanty Town (Buddy Hall, Anita Kerr Singers) -- Buddy Hall and Dolores Watson talk -- Any Place I Hang My Hat Is Home (Dolores Watson) -- Comedy routine (David Cobb, Buddy Hall, Dolores Watson) -- Won't You Come Home Bill Bailey (Anita Kerr Singers) -- Lion Oil commercial (David Cobb, Buddy Hall) -- Lion Oil jingle (Dolores Watson) -- I Wanna Go Home (With You) (Buddy Hall, Dolores Watson)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Sunday down south (Radio program); Cobb, David (Announcer); Hall, Buddy (Singer); Bradley, Owen; Lion Orchestra (Musical group); Anita Kerr Singers; Watson, Dolores
